SEARCH
Package main

Class MainUI

java.lang.Object
main.MainUI
public class MainUI extends Object
This class handles the user interface for the Hospital Management System (HMS). It allows users to log in, create a new patient account, check their role, and manage session states. The class facilitates user authentication and displays appropriate user-specific UI based on the role.

    • createPatientAccount

      public static void createPatientAccount(Scanner sc)
      Creates a new patient account by calling the `addPatient` method from the `PatientsAcc` class.
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for user input.

    • login

      public static void login(Scanner sc)
      Prompts the user to log in based on their role (Patient, Doctor, Pharmacist, Administrator). The method authenticates the user and displays the appropriate user interface based on the role.
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for user input.

    • checkRole

      public static int checkRole(Scanner sc)
      Prompts the user to select their role (Patient, Doctor, Pharmacist, Administrator). Returns the corresponding integer value representing the selected role.
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for user input.
      Returns:
      The selected role as an integer (1 for Patient, 2 for Doctor, 3 for Pharmacist, 4 for Administrator).

    • logout

      public static void logout()
      Logs out the current user and resets the session color for the terminal.

    • resetPassword

      public static void resetPassword(Scanner sc)
      Submits a password reset request for a user.

      This method collects the user's ID and name via input, creates a new PasswordResetRequest, and submits it to the PasswordResetManager for processing. If the request is successfully submitted, a confirmation message is displayed.

      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for user input.

      Process:

      • Prompts the user to enter their User ID and Name.
      • Creates a PasswordResetRequest object with the provided details.
      • Submits the request to the PasswordResetManager.
      • Displays a confirmation message if the request is successfully added.

    • getLoggedInUser

      public static User getLoggedInUser()
      Returns the currently logged-in user.
      Returns:
      The User object representing the logged-in user.
